description: Numerical value of the following string operation iterated n-1 times on the string "1": (1) Concatenate "0" to the left and to the right to the old string and initialize a new string. (2) Scan the old string from left to right. Whenever "00" occurs in the old string, write "0" to the new string; whenever "01" or "10" occurs in the old string, write "1" to the new string; whenever "11" occurs in the old string, write "10" to the new string.
